census_year.title: Census year
census_year.description: The CLUE census year refers to the year in which surveying was completed.

block_id.title: Block ID
block_id.description: The Census area is divided into city blocks, each of which is identified by a unique block number. Blocks are primarily defined by major roads. There are around 606 blocks in the City of Melbourne.

clue_small_area.title: CLUE small area
clue_small_area.description: CLUE small areas are composed of a group of city blocks, each of which is identified by a unique block number.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Accommodation business provides short-term accommodation for visitors.

admin_and_support_services.title: Admin and Support Services
admin_and_support_services.description: Administrative and Support Services includes business engaged in performing routine support activities for the day-to-day operations of other businesses or organisations.

agriculture_and_mining.title: Agriculture and Mining
agriculture_and_mining.description: Agriculture, Forestry and Fishing includes business engaged in growing crops, raising animals, growing and harvesting timber, and harvesting fish and other animals from farms or their natural habitats. Mining includes business that extract naturally occurring mineral solids, such as coal and ores; liquid minerals, such as crude petroleum; and gases, such as natural gas.

arts_and_recreation_services.title: Arts and Recreation Services
arts_and_recreation_services.description: Arts and Recreation Services includes business engaged in preservation/exhibition of object/sites of historical, cultural or educational interest; production of artistic works and/or live performances/events/exhibits for public viewing; and the operation of facilities that enable patrons to participate in sporting or recreational activities.

business_services.title: Business Services
business_services.description: Business Services provide professional, scientific and technical services where labour inputs are integral to the production or service delivery. These services include scientific research, architecture, engineering, computer systems design, law, accountancy, advertising, market research, management and other consultancy, veterinary science and professional photography.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Construction includes business engaged in the construction, repair or maintenance of buildings and other structures.

education_and_training.title: Education and Training
education_and_training.description: Education and Training includes organisations in the provision and support of education and training.

electricity_gas_water_and_waste_services.title: Electricity, Gas, Water and Waste Services
electricity_gas_water_and_waste_services.description: Electricity, Gas, Water and Waste Services comprises business engaged in the provision of electricity; gas through mains systems; water; drainage; and sewage services.

finance_and_insurance.title: Finance and Insurance
finance_and_insurance.description: Financial and Insurance Services engage in financial transactions of financial assets and in facilitating financial transactions.

food_and_beverage_services.title: Food and Beverage Services
food_and_beverage_services.description: Food service business provide food and beverage services, preparation and serving of meals on and off site.

health_care_and_social_assistance.title: Health Care and Social Assistance
health_care_and_social_assistance.description: Health Care and Social Assistance includes business providing human health care and social assistance.

information_media_and_telecommunications.title: Information Media and Telecommunications
information_media_and_telecommunications.description: Information Media and Telecommunications business engage in creating, enhancing and storing information products in media, transmitting using analogue and digital signals or providing transmission services and infrastructure.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Manufacturing includes business mainly engaged in the physical or chemical transformation of materials, substances or components into new products (except agriculture and construction).

other_services.title: Other Services
other_services.description: Other Services includes a broad range of personal services; religious, civic, professional and other interest group services; selected repair and maintenance activities; and private households employing staff.

public_administration_and_safety.title: Public Administration and Safety
public_administration_and_safety.description: Public Administration and Safety includes units mainly engaged in Central, State or Local Government legislative, executive and judicial activities.

real_estate_services.title: Real Estate Services
real_estate_services.description: Real estate services includes business engaged in providing real estate services such as selling, renting and/or buying real estate for others, managing real estate for others and appraising real estate.

rental_and_hiring_services.title: Rental and Hiring Services
rental_and_hiring_services.description: Rental and Hiring Services engage in renting, hiring, or otherwise allowing the use of tangible or intangible assets.

retail_trade.title: Retail Trade
retail_trade.description: Retail Trade engages in the purchase and on-selling to the general public.

transport_postal_and_storage.title: Transport, Postal and Storage
transport_postal_and_storage.description: Transport, Postal and Warehousing includes business engaging in passenger transportation, freight and postal by road, rail, water or air. Also the provision of goods warehousing and storage.

wholesale_trade.title: Wholesale Trade
wholesale_trade.description: Wholesale Trade engages in the purchase and on-selling to businesses.

total_jobs_in_block.title: Total jobs in block
total_jobs_in_block.description: Total number of jobs in the block
